name: Rescue Team 4
description: Mother Nature is no match for the courageous men and women of the Rescue Team!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64 MB 3D DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 GHZ processor or better Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB 3D DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
